name: Toxic Mushrooms
description:
a game about a person who is lost in a island infected by toxic mushrooms

Controls:

W,A,D to move

Shoot to shoot

F to pick up weapons

W and E to switch colors 

R to reload

Right click to slow-mo

GamePlay:

green mushrooms dies from green bullets

blue mushrooms dies from blue bullets

orange and purple dies from any bullet

Enjoy :3
